vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.18
§ Maaziah = "consolation of Jehovah"
1) a priest in charge of the 24th course in the time of David
2) a priest who signed the covenant with Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   sacerdote; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪西亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華的安慰"
1) 大衛王時負責第廿四班事奉祭司(代上 24:18)
2) 在與尼希米所訂的公約上簽名的一位祭司(尼 10:8)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
玛西亚 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华的安慰"
1) 大卫王时负责第廿四班事奉祭司(代上 24:18)
2) 在与尼希米所订的公约上签名的一位祭司(尼 10:8)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.8; also called Maadiah at Neh.12.5; Moadiah at Neh.12.17;
§ Maaziah = "consolation of Jehovah"
1) a priest in charge of the 24th course in the time of David
2) a priest who signed the covenant with Nehemiah
